name: Banana Bread Latte
ingredients: 1 tbsp banana syrup or mashed ripe banana
description:
1. Brew a shot of espresso.
2. In a small saucepan, heat milk with banana syrup (or mashed banana) and spices until steaming.
3. Froth the milk mixture.
4. Pour milk over espresso.
5. Top with whipped cream and walnuts.

name: Best Slow Cooker Hot Chocolate
description:
1. Pour all ingredients into a slow cooker.
2. Cover and cook on low for 2 hours, stirring occasionally, until chocolate chips are melted.
3. Whisk well before serving to ensure mixture is smooth.
4. Ladle into mugs and serve warm.

name: Candy Cane Cocoa
description:
1. In a saucepan, heat milk until hot but not boiling.
2. Add chocolate and crushed candy canes; whisk until smooth and melted.
3. Pour into mugs.
4. Top with whipped cream and garnish with whole candy canes.

name: Citrus Honey Green Tea
description:
1. Heat water to 80°C (do not boil).
2. Place tea bag in a cup and pour over hot water.
3. Steep for 3 minutes.
4. Remove tea bag, stir in honey, and add citrus slices.

name: Creamy Homemade Hot Cocoa
description:
1. Gather The Ingredients.
2. Combine Sugar, Cocoa Powder, And Salt In A Saucepan; Add Boiling Water And Whisk Until Smooth. Bring Mixture To A Simmer, Stirring Continuously To Prevent Scorching, And Cook For 2 Minutes.
3. Stir In Milk And Heat Until Very Hot Without Boiling.
4. Remove From Heat; Add Vanilla.
5. Add Cream To Each Mug To Help Cool Cocoa To Drinking Temperature Then Divide Hot Cocoa Between 4 Mugs.
6. Serve Hot And Enjoy!

name: Delicious Vegan Hot Chocolate
description:
1. Add almond milk, cocoa powder, maple syrup, vanilla, and salt to a small saucepan.
2. Whisk constantly over medium heat until hot and smooth.
3. Do not let it boil.
4. Pour into mugs and enjoy.

name: Easy Mexican Hot Chocolate
description:
1. In a saucepan, whisk together milk, cocoa, sugar, cinnamon, and cayenne.
2. Heat over medium heat until steaming, whisking frequently.
3. Stir in vanilla extract.
4. Serve hot with a cinnamon stick garnish.

name: Freddo Espresso
description:
1. Brew a double shot of espresso.
2. While hot, mix in sugar if desired.
3. Pour espresso into a shaker with ice.
4. Shake vigorously until cold and foamy.
5. Strain over fresh ice in a glass.

name: Gingerbread Chai Oat Creamer
description:
1. Heat oat milk in a saucepan until simmering.
2. Add tea bag and spices; steep for 5-10 minutes.
3. Remove tea bag and stir in molasses.
4. Let cool and store in the fridge to use as a creamer for coffee or tea.

name: Ginger Turmeric Herbal Tea
description:
1. Bring water to a boil in a small saucepan.
2. Add turmeric and ginger; reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
3. Strain into a mug.
4. Add lemon juice and honey to taste.

name: Healthy Hot Cocoa
description:
1. Heat almond milk in a saucepan over medium heat.
2. Whisk in cacao powder, sweetener, and cinnamon.
3. Simmer for 2-3 minutes until smooth and hot.
4. Serve immediately.

name: Homemade White Hot Chocolate
description:
1. Stir milk, vanilla, and white chocolate chips together in a saucepan.
2. Cook over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until the white hot chocolate comes to a simmer and the chocolate melts.
3. Remove from heat and serve immediately, topped with whipped cream if desired.

name: Hot and Spicy Himalayan Tea
description:
1. Boil water with crushed ginger, cardamom, cinnamon, and cloves for 5 minutes.
2. Add tea leaves and simmer for 2 more minutes.
3. Add milk and sugar; bring to a boil again.
4. Strain and serve hot.

name: Hot Cocoa Mix
ingredients: Hot water or milk for serving
description:
1. Combine powdered milk, cocoa, sugar, and salt in a large bowl. Store in an airtight container.
2. To serve: Mix 1/3 cup of the mix with 1 cup of hot water or milk.
3. Stir until dissolved and enjoy.

name: Hot Cranberry Tea
description:
1. In a saucepan, combine cranberry juice, water, cloves, and cinnamon. Bring to a boil.
2. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 5 minutes.
3. Remove from heat. Add sugar, tea bags, and lemon juice.
4. Cover and steep for 5 minutes.
5. Strain and serve warm.

name: Iced Pistachio Latte
description:
1. Brew the espresso and mix with pistachio syrup.
2. Fill a glass with ice.
3. Pour milk over the ice.
4. Pour the espresso mixture over the milk.
5. Top with crushed pistachios.

name: Iced Pumpkin Spice Latte
description:
1. Whisk pumpkin puree, maple syrup, and pumpkin pie spice into the milk until smooth.
2. Fill a glass with ice.
3. Pour the pumpkin milk over the ice.
4. Add the cooled espresso shot.
5. Stir and enjoy.

name: Java Chip Frappe
description:
1. Place ice, coffee, milk, chocolate chips, and syrup into a blender.
2. Blend on high until smooth and creamy.
3. Pour into a tall glass.
4. Top with whipped cream and extra chocolate syrup.

name: London Fog
description:
1. Steep Earl Grey tea in hot water for 3-5 minutes.
2. Remove tea bag and stir in vanilla syrup.
3. Top with steamed, frothy milk.
4. Serve immediately.

name: Mayan Hot Chocolate
ingredients: 1 disc Mexican chocolate (or 2 tbsp cocoa + 1 tsp cinnamon)
description:
1. Heat milk in a saucepan over medium heat.
2. Add chocolate, cayenne, and sugar.
3. Whisk constantly until chocolate is melted and mixture is frothy.
4. Serve hot.

name: Onion Tea
description:
1. Bring water to a boil.
2. Add onion quarters.
3. Reduce heat and simmer for 10-15 minutes.
4. Strain the liquid into a cup.
5. Add honey if desired to mask the taste. Used as a traditional remedy.

name: Peppermint Mocha Creamer
description:
1. In a saucepan, whisk together cream, milk, cocoa, and sugar.
2. Heat until sugar and cocoa are dissolved (do not boil).
3. Remove from heat and stir in peppermint extract.
4. Store in the refrigerator and use as a coffee creamer.

name: Perfect Vanilla Tea
description:
1. Steep black tea in hot water for 3-5 minutes.
2. Remove tea bag.
3. Stir in vanilla extract.
4. Add milk and sugar as desired.

name: Polar Express Hot Chocolate
description:
1. Combine heavy cream, condensed milk, chocolate chips, and milk in a large pot.
2. Heat over medium-low, stirring constantly until chips melt and mixture is hot.
3. Stir in vanilla.
4. Serve rich and creamy.

name: Reverse Dalgona Iced Coffee
description:
1. Whisk instant coffee, sugar, and hot water until thick and creamy (the dalgona whip).
2. Place the whip at the BOTTOM of a glass.
3. Add ice cubes on top.
4. Pour cold milk over the ice and whip to create the reverse effect.

name: Slow Cooker Chai
description:
1. Add all ingredients to a slow cooker.
2. Cook on high for 2 hours or low for 4 hours.
3. Stir occasionally.
4. Strain before serving if using loose spices, or ladle directly if using powder.

name: Spanish Style Hot Chocolate
description:
1. Dissolve cornstarch in a tablespoon of milk.
2. Heat remaining milk in a saucepan.
3. Add chocolate and sugar; whisk until melted.
4. Whisk in cornstarch mixture and cook until thickened.
5. Serve thick and hot.

name: Té de Canela
description:
1. Bring water and cinnamon sticks to a boil.
2. Reduce heat and simmer for 10-15 minutes until water turns reddish-brown.
3. Remove cinnamon sticks.
4. Sweeten as desired and serve.

name: Thai Spice Sweet Tea
description:
1. Steep tea, anise, and cardamom in boiling water for 5 minutes.
2. Strain the tea.
3. Stir in sugar and condensed milk while hot.
4. Enjoy warm or pour over ice.

name: Turmeric Coffee Latte
description:
1. Whisk milk, turmeric, ginger, and pepper in a saucepan over medium heat until hot and frothy.
2. Brew espresso.
3. Pour spiced milk over the espresso.
4. Sweeten with honey.
